entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening and then to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
